# Services

## Forge {#Forge cost}

```{r}
dfs=read_xlsx(bookdownallgdatapath,sheet="forgecost")



dfs = dfs %>% select("Item", "Tier", "Repair cost per +1 condition at smith", "Rep from 1 to Max condition",
                "upgrade cost", "upgrade to higher animal")
colnames(dfs)[3:6]= c("Repair by one condition", "Full repair", "Improvement", "Upgrade by one animal")

dfs %>% arrange(item) %>%
  mutate(`repair by one state` = round(`repair by one state`)) %>%
  reactable(groupBy = "item",
            columns = list(
              
              Object = colDef(
                grouped = JS("function(cellInfo) {
                            return cellInfo.value
                          }"), align="left", minWidth= 150, filterable=T
                
              ),
              Tier = colDef(filterable=T)
            ), bordered = F,
            highlight = T,
            #showPageSizeOptions = T,
            filterable = F,
            pageSizeOptions = c(5,10, 20, 50),
            defaultPageSize = 24, paginationType = "jump",
            theme= overallThemeReactable, defaultColDef = colDef(
              align = "center"
            ), outlined = T,
            striped=T, resizable = T)
```
